column4: Cany anyone tell me why all HD videos are choppy in Ubuntu but they play fine with the same hardware in Windows?  ALL HD vids are choppy on this machine, but the windows partition plays them flawlessly.  Why doesnt this work and how do I fix it?

Ubuntu is becvoming a joke to me.  So many problems that I never had with windows.  No sound via speakers from mic, cocputer goes to sleep and doesnt wake up (set to NOT sleep), no sound in games (especially when FireFox is open) etc.  Why was this version of Ubuntu even released when it has so many problems compraed to the competition?
are you using the current version karmic?  if so you might want to use the previous version if that worked better and wait for ubuntu lucid to be released
